thread.title: Timea Farkas

author: Timea Farkas
title: Timea Farkas
text: I've found 365games a few months ago where it was the only place I could find the game I was looking for. It became my go to place for board and card games as their prices are usually unbeatable. I also love that they have a lot of offers and sales and you can collect player points to use up in upcoming purchases. Overall, only good experiences and I will definitely keep buying from 365!
